nodes.text: no srsly imagine being the biggest disgusting piece of sh*t because a freaking dance show..
no srsly i know i shouldn't get upset about it (because sadly i should be way too used to it) but it was one homophobic comment too much.

german ppl be like why is everyone still talking about homophobia/racism/etc. everyone is the same and it doesn't matter!!! *proceed to say something utterly homophobic/racist in the same breath*.. when i tell you i f*cking hate this country. 😊
